settings.heading: KIDS EAR PIERCINGS
settings.short_description: We specialise in safe and fun Piercings for your little ones

settings.title: Safe piercings for your little ones
settings.text:
Saying that we love piercings kid’s ears sounds kind of weird. But it’s actually really cool. The little gals and guys who come in with their parents are super special to us.

The SkinKandy Squad are specialist Piercers, proud of every piercing we do, and that means ensuring that every customer, both big and teeny-tiny, have a great experience. In an industry that sometimes comes across as a bit, well… scary… we provide a safe and family-friendly environment using industry-leading equipment and maintaining strict hygiene practices.

NOW WITH 60+ STORES NATION WIDE

settings.title: Double operator service
settings.text:
Having two operators means that both ears can be pierced at the same time. The piercing is over and done with before they know it and there is no risk of your child not wanting to do the second ear!

We suggest making a booking for the double operator service so that we can ensure two piercers are available at your preferred time. Weekends and holidays are some of our busiest times, so it’s a good idea to call ahead on the day to make sure we have a free space for you.

settings.testimonial: I bought my daughter in for her first lobe piercing and the staff were so great with her, made her giggle and she loved the whole process
settings.author: HARRIET .L

settings.testimonial: Pierced my 10 month old daughters ears. They were so patient and precise with the placement and making sure she was comfortable and happy. Very happy!
settings.author: NIKI

settings.testimonial: They were fantastic with my nervous daughter getting her first lobe piercings. Great service.
settings.author: Di

settings.title: Double operator service
settings.text:
Having two operators means that both ears can be pierced at the same time. The piercing is over and done with before they know it and there is no risk of your child not wanting to do the second ear!

We suggest making a booking for the double operator service so that we can ensure two piercers are available at your preferred time. Weekends and holidays are some of our busiest times, so it’s a good idea to call ahead on the day to make sure we have a free space for you.

settings.title: Jewellery choice
settings.text: Not only do we stock a large range of initial piercing jewellery (including titanium and 14kt solid gold), we also have a range of high-quality studs and sleepers in all kinds of fun designs to change to when the piercings are healed.

settings.title: 14kt Solid Gold
settings.text:
14 karat gold is suitable for sensitive skin. Our solid gold pieces won't wear or tarnish.

Available in white or yellow gold, there is something for everyone. Ideal for your littles ones sensitive skin.

Ask your local skinkandy staff member about piercing with gold today!

settings.title: Titanium
settings.text:
Titanium is apremium quality metal,it is stronger than steel, but is approximately 45% lighter, putting less weight on your piercings to promote better healing.

Titanium is also hypoallergenic with no nickel or alloys, promoting faster healing. Meaning its a perfect choice if you have a nickel allergy or sensitive skin.

settings.title: Method of choice
settings.text:
Gone are the days of the old-school, re-usable plastic guns! We use a device that is individually packaged, single-use and sterile, ensuring a safer, more hygienic procedure. It is also more gentle and quiet than the old school piercing guns, making for a nicer experience for your child.

At SkinKandy, from 5 years onwards we offer needles as a method of choice. Simply ask one of our piercers about your options and make the choice that’s right for you.

settings.title: Aftercare Tips
settings.text:
1. Clean Twice Daily With Aftercare
  2. It's important that your little one doesnt touch or play with their piercing. Grubby hands and excessive movement can lead to infections and delayed healing.
  3. It's important to help minimise side sleeping wherever possible as lying on healing piercings causes unwanted pressure. Dependent on their age you might find a donut or travel pillow helpful.
  4. Avoid Swimming
  5. Clean Your Hands Before Changing Over Jewellery
  6. Keep Hair Products Away From Area
